sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-account-setup', templateUrl: './account-setup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./account-setup.component.css'] }) export class AccountSetupComponent { @Output() updateStep = new EventEmitter(); onNext(): void { this.updateStep.emit(2); // Indica mover al paso 2 } // ... }

Step 1

Enter your account information
